name: Ashto
description:
Ashto is a 2D abstract puzzle game for Android.

Game features:

  • Simple and intuitive controls
  • 70 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Each puzzle presents a new and fresh challenge building on familiar mechanics
  • Made with love (and coffee)

Made by Marco Tais

Music : Ambiment by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3359-ambiment

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
